tests.name: compile
tests.run: sudo apt install -y openjdk-17-jdk && export PATH="/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64/bin/:$PATH" && mvn --version && mvn compile

tests.name: spring run
tests.run: sudo apt install -y openjdk-17-jdk && export PATH="/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64/bin/:$PATH" && mvn --version && mvn spring-boot:run
